settings.name: USER
settings.description: The username of the default docker user to use for docker commands that require that.

settings.name: PASSWORD
settings.description: The password of the default docker user to use for docker commands that require that.

params.name: PATH
params.description: The path of the the docker file to build the image from.

params.name: TAG
params.description: If specified, tag the new docker image with the specified tag.

params.name: USER
params.description: The username of the docker user to use to authenticate for this request.

params.name: PASSWORD
params.description: The password of the docker user to use to authenticate for this request.

params.name: IMAGE
params.description: The name of the image to pull.

params.name: TAG
params.description: The tag/version of the image to pull. On default will use 'latest'.

params.name: URL
params.description: If specified, pull the image from the specified registry/repository. On default use the Docker Hub registry.

params.name: USER
params.description: The username of the docker user to use to authenticate for this request.

params.name: PASSWORD
params.description: The password of the docker user to use to authenticate for this request.

params.name: IMAGE
params.description: The name of the image to push.

params.name: IMAGETAG
params.description: The tag/version of the image to push. On default will use 'latest'.

params.name: URL
params.description: If specified, push the image to the specified registry/repository. On default use the Docker Hub registry.

params.name: SOURCEIMAGE
params.description: The URL of the registry the image is stored on. On default use the Docker Hub registry.

params.name: SOURCEIMAGETAG
params.description: The name + tag(will assume 'latest' if tag not specified) of the image to tag.

params.name: NEWIMAGE
params.description: The URL of the registry to store the new image tag on. On default use the Docker Hub registry.

params.name: NEWIMAGETAG
params.description: The name + tag of the new image to create.

params.name: PARAMS
params.description: The docker command to run. No need to specify 'docker' in the start of the command.
